name: Mini Key Lime Pies
author: Lisawas
summary: Nothing taste better than key lime pie made with fresh key limes. This one is really tasty and super simple to make. Mini pies are great because everyone can have their own.
ingredients: 1 cup freshly squeezed Key lime juice
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place mini graham cracker crusts onto a baking sheet
In a bowl, whisk together the sweetened condensed milk, sour cream, Key lime juice, and Key lime zest until smooth
Pour the filling into the graham cracker crusts, filling to the top
Bake in the preheated oven until hot, 5 to 8 minutes
Refrigerate until thoroughly chilled, at least 1 hour
To serve, garnish each mini pie with a Key lime slice and a dollop of whipped cream topping
